name: You Must Learn Control! [GMTK20]
description:
"You Must Learn Control" is an entry for the GMTK20 Game Jam.

It is an arcade game in which the player must use their 'CTRL' key in order to keep a boulder floating in the air using the power of The Force. As the player keeps their boulder afloat, seagulls will fly past in an attempt to throw off your concentration. Avoiding these seagulls earns the player points.

The game ends when the player fails to keep the boulder afloat, or the boulder is hit by a seagull. 

The game features increasing difficulty in the form of increased speed and increased spawn rates as time goes on.

Will you master your boulder lifting abilities and become a True Jedi?!

Art/Programming - Jasonblox6

Music - DL-Sounds

Sound Effects - Lego Star Wars Yoda
